titleStmt.title: A body of divinity with fundamentall scriptures, drawn into a table: / by Robert Betts, preacher of the Gospel at Swanscombe in Kent.
titleStmt.author: Betts, Robert, d. 1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Cotes, for Io. Bellamie, and are to bee sold at his shop, at the three Golden Lions in Cornhill, neare the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop, at the three Golden Lions in Cornhill, neare the Royall Exchange
